string.text: Guard the stalkers on their way to the anomalous area
Guard the stalkers on their way to the anomalous area. Once there, speak to the squad commander for a reward.
Defend the stalkers in the anomalous area
Defend the stalkers in the anomalous area.
Cover the mercenaries
The mercenaries are attacking the bandits on the other side of the river. Provide covering fire and help them get in position.
Destroy the bandits
The bandits are too many - they’re preventing the mercenaries from lowering the bridge. Kill as many bandits as possible.
Cover the mercenary near the control panel
A mercenary has secured a position near the bridge control panel. Provide covering fire while the mercenary lowers the bridge.
Assume firing position
Assume a firing position on the first floor of the gatehouse. This is the most effective vantage point to fire at bandits.
Eliminate the snipers on the hill
The snipers have the bridge control panel covered - with them alive the mercenaries have no chance of lowering the bridge. Eliminate the snipers on the hill.
Talk to Lebedev
The bridge has been lowered and the road to Limansk is clear. Talk to Lebedev.
Wait until the stalker squad arrives
Wait until the stalker squad arrives.
Bring the “Compass” to Forester

Thanks to the “Compass”, Forester managed to get out of a space bubble several days ago. The artifact should prove helpful once again to get the mercenaries out of their bubble. Bring Forester the “Compass”.
Find the “Compass” artifact

Forester found a unique artifact in a space anomaly, which is very similar to the bubble that the mercenaries got themselves into near the military warehouses. On his way back, Forester was robbed by bandits and lost the artifact. Find the “Compass”.
Talk to Forester
Forester lives in the deserted hut. He can help you find a way to Limansk. Talk to Forester.
Find the space anomaly

The missing group’s PDA had some notes about a path through the Red Forest. In its depths, there is a space anomaly which leads to the old hut at the edge of the forest. That’s where Forester lives. Find the space anomaly.
Deliver the PDA with a map of the Red Forest
Deliver the PDA with a map of the Red Forest.
Respond to the SOS signal
The path to Forester through the Red Forest is unknown. There is a help signal coming from the Red Forest. Respond to the signal.
Help Clear Sky capture the bridge

A mercenary squad is approaching the bridge to Limansk. They will come out on the bandit side of the river, so the action at that bridge will get real hot real soon. Help Clear Sky lower the bridge to Limansk.
Eliminate the ambush
Strelok is being covered by a group of stalkers. Eliminate the ambush.
Stop Strelok
Strelok has gone into the tunnel. Go after him and make sure he doesn’t advance to the center of the Zone.
Stop Strelok
Strelok is somewhere very close, within 100 meters. Chase him down.
Capture the old mine
Capture the old mine. The area has a high level of anomalous activity and plenty of rare artifacts.
Go to the army base
The army base has a powerful transmitter, which can be used to send a signal to the group trapped in the space bubble near Limansk. Go to the military warehouses.
Find a way to the anomalous area

The missing group’s PDA had some notes about a path through the Red Forest. In its depths, there is a space anomaly which leads to the old hut on the edge of the forest. That’s where Forester lives. Find the space anomaly.
Receive the radio message

Forester receives unintelligible bits and pieces of radio communications from an unidentified group that got trapped in a strange anomaly very near Limansk. The group may know an alternative way to Limansk. Go to the military warehouses and find a place suitable for receiving a clearer signal.
Pick up the PDA
A dead stalker’s PDA is still active. It may contain valuable information about the Red Forest. Pick up the PDA.
Bring back the PDA with a map of the Red Forest

Merc, we could use your help. We need an accurate map of the Red Forest. I heard that several groups of stalkers tried to explore the Forest but most of them vanished. Find their notes and bring them to me.
Bring back the tank machine gun

Here’s a job for you. I heard from Forester that there’s an old Soviet tank deep in the forest. Nobody knows how it got there, except that it appeared after the powerful emission. The thing is, the tank is pretty much intact. Sure, you couldn’t drive it but you could remove the machine gun that’s mounted on it. Bring me that machine gun and your efforts will be well rewarded.
Return the experimental device

There’s something you can return for me. We were testing a prototype for the scientists, a small device used to measure anomaly strength. It’s not much use at this stage - it took them two days just to teach us how to use it. We were collecting information in the old mine when something happened, something attacked us… All sorts of crap started flying at us and I was the only one to make it out alive. The device was left down there with the boys - they got thrown into some anomalies. That thing that attacked us is probably still down there too, so it won’t be easy getting it back, but if you manage you’ll get a good reward.
